main.name: PROJECTS || BLOGS || DESIGNS
main.description: Hi Everyone, I am Ritika Singh . I am currently pursuing my Btech in Computer Science from Vellore Institute Of Tchnology, Vellore. Apart from developing softwares, I find my interest in UI/UX Designing,  Technical Blogging  Drawing and Painting.
main.bio: Someone ordinary with an extravagant fondness and passion forSoftware Development. I am a keen learner with fluent knowledge in languages like C++, Python ,Java
main.contactmessage: Full Stack MERN developer with hands-on experience on various projects with a social impact.

address.about: Interested and experienced in Backend develpment with NodeJS and Flask,Full Stack MERN developer with hands-on experience on various projects with a social impact.,and Frontend development with ReactJS.
